TopicTitle: Best way to keep my Kerbal games in sync on my laptop and desktop

Articles.Content:
Can someone point me to the best way to have my latest save on the internet where I could pick up where I left off on either my laptop or desktop. Dropbox maybe or is there a better way?

BONUS: Is there a good way to keep all my mod configurations the same on the laptop and desktop.

Any ideas would be appreciated.

ANSWERED: GOOGLE DRIVE!! YAY!

Edited May 18, 2014 by Probus
